channel.title: arrangeit
channel.description: arrangeit - cross-platform desktop utility for easy windows management

item.title: arrangeit v0.3alpha has been released!
item.description: Initial public release - TL; DR end users, Pythonistas, graphic designers and proofreaders are invited to join a brand new open-source multi-platform Python project arrangeit v0.3alpha in action About arrangeit - cross-platform desktop utility for easy windows management Version 0.91 was the last published version of a Win95/98 desktop utility named ArrangeIt. Twenty years...
